1.title: IMDb at New York Comic Con 2018

episode of.title: IMDb at New York Comic Con (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Kevin Smith hosts IMDb's exclusive coverage of New York Comic Con 2018 from the Javits Center. Stay tuned for celebrity interviews and on-the-ground coverage of the latest and breaking news happening at the Con.

2.title: Stars Predict the Next Superman at NYCC 2018

episode of.title: IMDb at New York Comic Con (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: From IMDb at New York Comic Con, Nick Kroll, Fred Armisen, Brenton Thwaites, and more play the IMDb Pizza Game and reveal who they want cast as the next Superman.

3.title: How Dark is "Chilling Adventures of Sabrina?"

episode of.title: IMDb at New York Comic Con (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: The cast and creator of "Chilling Adventures of Sabrina" describe the horrific and twisted vibe of their show.

4.title: Cast Love Playing Angels and Demons

episode of.title: IMDb at New York Comic Con (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: David Tennant, Michael Sheen and Jon Hamm talk to Kevin Smith about what it was like bringing their characters to life and why Hamm's character is the boss you hate.

5.title: Star Relishes Sansa's Growth

episode of.title: IMDb at New York Comic Con (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: We couldn't talk to Sophie Turner about 'Dark Phoenix' and not ask a question about "Game of Thrones." Turner chats with Kevin Smith about how she feels about Sansa's transformation from "girly girl to warrior queen."

6.title: Hellboy Will Officiate Your Wedding

episode of.title: IMDb at New York Comic Con (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: 'Hellboy' star David Harbour talks to Kevin Smith about how he engages with his fans on social media, and the time he officiated a wedding as his "Stranger Things" character.

7.title: Stars Choose Superhero NYC Tour Guides

episode of.title: IMDb at New York Comic Con (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: David Harbour, Kiernan Shipka, Jon Hamm, and other stars play a round of our IMDb Pizza Game and reveal which superhero (and in some cases, villain) they would want as their New York City tour guide.

8.title: Stars of the Show Talk "Outlander" Babies

episode of.title: IMDb at New York Comic Con (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan and the cast of "Outlander" appreciate how much fans love the show and chat about how cool it is to see their characters be a part of American history.

1.title: IMDb LIVE at New York Comic Con 2017

episode of.title: IMDb at New York Comic Con (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: For the first time, IMDb is teaming up with Twitch and Reedpop for a two-hour live show, "IMDb LIVE at New York Comic Con," hosted by Kevin Smith, on Saturday October 7. Tune in for an inside look at celebrity interviews, breaking news, and exclusive convention coverage of upcoming films and TV shows.

imdb.title: IMDb at New York Comic Con
plot: Kevin Smith hosts IMDb's coverage of New York Comic Con, the East Coast's largest pop culture convention. Tune in for an all-access inside look at celebrity interviews, breaking news, and exclusive convention coverage of upcoming films and TV shows.
